verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
What shall I offer to the Lord,
to make him happy?
O tell me,
What shall I offer to the Lord
to please him? x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I may give him the best of my
clothes, he may not take it.
I may give him the best of
my shoes, he may not take it. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
A loving heart, (he will love),
a patient heart, (he will love),
a humble heart, (he will love)
a caring heart,
he will love. x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I may give him the gift of a
ram, he may not take it.
I may give him the gift of
a cow, he may not take it. x2
